name: Mother's Mindfulness
summary: You have the protective instinct your own mother lacks and will gladly suffer in another's place.
description:
You have the protective instinct your own mother lacks and will gladly suffer in another's place. You interpose yourself in the attack's path. You become the target of the triggering attack and are automatically hit by the attack (or critically hit if the ally was critically hit), suffering the full effects in your ally's place.Traits

Changeling: A creature with this trait has the changeling versatile heritage. Changelings are the children of hags and members of other humanoid ancestries. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by changelings.
trigger: An adjacent ally is hit by an attack.
